title: Solletia - Indie music NFT website
description: About 70% of indie musicians make less then $10,000 a year from their music.  How can they generate more revenue and connect with fans?
solution: An website that allows indie musicians to sell NFTs of albums, individual songs, album covers, and autographed band / concert photos.
experience:
2 software engineers with ~20 yrs experience each, including full-stack dev, and cloud devops.

1 digital artist, art teacher, for UI/UX.
